title: How do tech review YouTubers afford all the new equipment for each video when they are starting out on YouTube? - Quora

response.answer_text: I will suggest that starting out just use your smartphone to record your videos. I love this quote by Arthur Ashe “Start where you are, use what you have and do what you can” Once you shoot enough videos with your smartphone and get enough videos out you will be able to earn revenue to buy the equipment you want. I hope this helps. Ade
